question_text:
Question 19
                           
 
 
The size distribution of powder particles used in Powder Metallurgy process can be determined by  
 
(A) Laser absorption  
 
(B) Laser reflection 
 
(C) Laser penetration   
 
(D) Laser scattering
Production Engineering (Powder Metallurgy) 
 
Ans. 
D 
Sol.
 
The size distribution of powder particles used in powder metallurgy process can be determined by laser 
scattering. 
 
Hence, the correct option is (D).
